content: hook  beg beginning - the first st or other indicated space of the row/round  repeat repeat - repeat the instructions starting at the asterisk *  skip skip - leave the indicated st unworked  same same st - the same st as the join at the base of your beginning chain 1  prev previous - the st or round you just worked  join shorthand for ending each round - slip_stitch in the 1st st of the round  fo fasten_off - cut yarn tail pull up the loop on the hook and pass your yarn tail through pull tight to close weave in ends  if invisible finish - use when fastening off for a cleaner look see my photo tutorial for a full explanation playinhookydesigns blogspot com/p/invisible- finish html  magic_ring - see my photo tutorial playinhookydesigns blogspot com/p/ magic-ring html  to change colors finish last st of round to last two loops on hook yo with new color and pull through join with new color  chain 2 counts as a st chain 1 does not count as a st  pay attention to where you start your stitches in each round so your waves line up properly see my youtube video tutorial for more help http // youtu be/7sojub_lcei  you do not need to cut the yarn after each round carry each color up the seam and pick it up when you need it again be sure not to pull too tightly or leave the yarn too loose the yarn strands won t be felt or seen when worn this will give you fewer ends to weave in and make a ravel-resistant beanie  when only one st count is given it applies to all sizes 4 brain waves beanie child playin hooky designs worsted 4 yarn i-5 50mm hook sizes written kids adult adult large magic_ring see pg3 notes for tutorial notes r1 chain 1 work 8 half_double_crochet in ring pull yarn tail tight to close join to the 1st st with a slip_stitch 8 sts 1 continue to r2 chain ring r1 chain 4 slip_stitch in 1st chain to make a ring chain 1 work 8 half_double_crochet in ring do not join you will be working in a spiral 8 sts 1 continue to r2 r2 chain 1 work 2 half_double_crochet in same st & in each st to end join to 1st half_double_crochet 16 sts 2 r3 accent chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in same st 1 single_crochet in next st * 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st repeat from * to end join to 1st single_crochet 24 2½ r4 chain 1 work 2 half_double_crochet in same st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts * 2 half_double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts repeat from * to end join to 1st half_double_crochet 32 3½ r5 chain 1 work 2 half_double_crochet in same st 1
